#summary All open9x compilations options

= Introduction =

We will soon run out of flash, and it will be difficult to enable all options in the same time. Here is the list of all options available in open9x so that you may choose the ones that you need / want.

To compile the firmware here is the syntax:
{{{
make OPTION1=VALUE1 OPTION2=VALUE2...
}}}

= Options =

{{{
PCB *STD*/V4
}}}
Either the stock PCB or the gruvin9x v4 board

{{{
EXT *STD*/FRSKY/JETI
}}}
Telemetry extension

{{{
HELI YES/*NO*
}}}
Heli support and menus

{{{TEMPLATES *YES*/NO}}}
Templates screen enabled

{{{NAVIGATION NO/*POTS*/RE1}}}
Pots use in menus navigation

{{{BEEPER *BUZZER*/BUZZER_MOD/SPEAKER}}}
How the sounds are sent

{{{SPLASH *YES*/NO}}}
Splash displayed on Tx start

{{{BATT BANDGAP/UNSTABLE_BANDGAP}}}

{{{DECIMALS *YES*/NO}}}
Decimals displayed in outputs values

{{{FRSKY_HUB *YES*/NO}}}
FrSky Hub supported (when EXT=FRSKY)

{{{WS_HOW_HIGH *YES*/NO}}}
Winged Shadow How High supported (when EXT=FRSKY)

{{{LOGS *YES*/NO}}}
When V4 board used: logs enabled on SD-card

{{{DSM2 *NO*/SERIAL/PPM}}}
DSM2 protocol

{{{PXX *NO*/YES}}}
Port from er9x in progress...

DSM2 NO/YES

SILVER NO/YES

CTP1009 NO/YES

SOMO NO/YES
